title: Something is preventing me from patching
body: League protmps me and says somethings wrong with ur servers and is preventing me from patching so i restart like they ask me to and no patch happens everytime. what should i do reinstall? (error 003)

replies.body: This issue has been impacting many players and it's being tracked in this [incident thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/HLBQzvEa-1121-patching-issues?show=flat).  Things should be starting to get back up, though.
Be patient, Riot is probably working on it as we speak (type?)

> [{quoted}](name=w1ll,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=i8e1dpEL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-21T19:39:37.001+0000)
>
> Be patient, Riot is probably working on it as we speak (type?)

It's been over 8 hours.
